name: A snail's quest for the drippeist chain ever
name_original: A snail's quest for the drippeist chain ever
description: This was supposed to be a harder vertical platformer, so it will take multiple attempts to figure out where the potions are and the timing/platforms to take. I ran out of time to polish up the level and backgrounds but like how the overall gameplay came out. This is also a game for https://itch.io/jam/mechjam3. Hope you dig it.
